statements.select: select x.OldManId,OldManName,$PivotColumnsForSelect$ from Oca_OldManBaseInfo_V x left join ( select OldManId,$PivotColumns$ from(select r.oldManId,r.ReserveDate,dbo.JoinStr(cast(r.Id as varchar(8))+'|'+r.ReserveFrom+'|'+r.ReserveTo+'|' +cast(r.ServeManId as char(36))+'|'+r.ServeManName+ '|' + r.ServeItemB+'|' + dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',r.ServeItemB) +'|' + r.ServeDuration +'|' + r.Description + '|' + CAST(isnull(r.WorkOrderId,'00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') as CHAR(36))+ '|' +convert(varchar,isnull(w.ServeManArriveTime,''),108) +'|' +convert(varchar,isnull(w.ServeManLeaveTime,''),108) ) as ServeInfo from Oca_MerchantServiceReserve r left join Oca_ServiceWorkOrder w on r.WorkOrderId=w.WorkOrderId where r.StationId=#StationId# group By r.oldManId, r.ReserveDate) a pivot(max(ServeInfo) for ReserveDate in($PivotColumns$))b ) y on x.OldManId =y.OldManId inner join Oca_MerchantServeManMappingOldMan a on a.OldManId=x.OldManId where Status =1 and AreaId3 = '$AreaId$'and ServeManId=#ServeManId# GovTurnkeyFlag=#GovTurnkeyFlag# $OldManName$ order by OldManName asc

select 1 as PlaceHolder from ( select ReserveDate,ReserveFrom,ReserveTo,OldManId,(select OldManName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo where OldManId=a.OldManId) as OldManName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName from Oca_MerchantServiceReserve a where ServeManId in( select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) DATEDIFF(d,ReserveDate,#ReserveDate#)=0 )x

select x.* from ( select top ($PageNo$*$PageSize$) row_number() over(Order By $OrderByClause$) as SN, ReserveDate,ReserveFrom,ReserveTo,OldManId,(select OldManName from Oca_OldManBaseInfo where OldManId=a.OldManId) as OldManName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName from Oca_MerchantServiceReserve a where ServeManId in( select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) DATEDIFF(d,ReserveDate,#ReserveDate#)=0 )x where x.SN > ($PageNo$-1)*$PageSize$
